original: Araṇaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁araṇ aṃ ▁upādinnupādāniy aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁n asaraṇ o ▁na upādinn upādān iyo ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ

original: Araṇaṁ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁araṇ aṃ ▁an upādinn a an upādān iyaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁n asaraṇ o ▁na an upādinn a an upādān iyo ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ
